translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions for the Doctrinal Exemplifications

analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  na hetu sa hetuka duka sa ni dassana ttika
translated: The Section on the Doctrinal Exemplifications in Triads

original: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na hetum na sa hetukam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu ahetukaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā eka  na hetum na ahetukam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu ahetukaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: With respect to the clause “With a non-cause that is not a non-cause … a non-sign that is not a non-sign … a non-adverting that is not a non-adverting … a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not a sign … a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not an adverting … a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not a sign and that is not an adverting,” there is one triad.

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With respect to the clause “With a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not a sign that is not a non-sign … a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not an adverting that is not a non-adverting … a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not a sign that is not a non-sign and that is not an adverting that is not a non-adverting,” there is one triad.🔽With respect to the clause “With a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not a sign that is not a non-sign and that is not an adverting that is not a non-adverting,” there is one triad.

original: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na hetum na sa hetukam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca tīṇi yeva saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi 🔽na hetum na sa hetukam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu ahetukaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ
translated: With respect to the clause “With a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not a non-sign that is not a sign … a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not a non-adverting that is not an adverting … a non-cause that is not a non-cause and that is not a non-sign that is not a sign and that is not a non-adverting that is not an adverting,” there is one triad.

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka
translated: … has a cause with that condition. (In brief.) As to cause one, as to predominance one … As to non-obstruction one …
